title: Pirates invite six to Spring Training
subtitle: Pirates invite six to Spring Training
body: PITTSBURGH -- The Pittsburgh Pirates signed right-handers Brandon Duckworth, Scott Strickland, Marty McCleary and Nerio Rodriguez, southpaw C.J. Nitkowski and infielder Gookie Dawkins to Minor League deals on Thursday.  All six players have been invited to Pittsburgh's big league Spring Training camp.  Duckworth, 29, has posted a 16-21 record with a 5.34 ERA in 91 career appearances, including 66 starts, with the Phillies and Astros. He went 0-1 with an 11.02 ERA in seven appearances with Houston in 2005 after beginning the season at Triple-A Round Rock. Ed Eagle is a reporter for MLB.com. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.
author: Ed Eagle
